actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 to exclude public employee pension benefit plans from the operation of Section 235.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 to exempt Federal, local, State, or municipal government pension benefit plans from the limitations placed on maximum benefits and contributions of employees and employers under the terms of qualified pension plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 to exclude public employee pension benefit plans from the operation of Section 235.
